title: Tennessee
prompt: A weathered county road stretching toward a distant small town under overcast morning light, with a shuttered storefront or closed business visible on the horizon; foreground shows an empty rural intersection or Main Street with sparse buildings, captured from a low angle emphasizing scale and isolation. Warm gray and amber tones, documentary-style photography with shallow depth of field, conveying quiet decline and structural emptiness rather than active hardshipâ€”the visual weight of absence rather than struggle.
